sqlMap.select:
SELECT pro.PROJECT_ID, pro.PROJECT_NO, pro.PROJECT_NAME, pro.CUS_ID, cus.CUS_NAME, pro.CM_ID, cmusr.USER_FULLNAME CM_NAME, pro.PM_ID, pmusr.USER_FULLNAME PM_NAME, pro.PROJECT_TYPE, ptt.text PROJECT_TYPE_DESC, pro.CONTRACT_ID, pro.CONTRACT_SUM, DATE_FORMAT(pro.SIGN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') SIGN_DATE, pro.PAY_TYPE, DATE_FORMAT(pro.WORK_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') WORK_END_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(pro.WORK_START_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') WORK_START_DATE, pro.YEAR_PAY, DATE_FORMAT(pro.SERVICE_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') SERVICE_END_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(pro.PAY_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') PAY_DATE, pro.BUILD_TYPE, dbt.text BUILD_TYPE_DESC, DATE_FORMAT(pro.JOIN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') JOIN_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(pro.STOP_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') STOP_DATE, pro.PROJECT_REMARK, DATE_FORMAT(pro.UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') UPD_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(pro.INS_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') INS_DATE, insusr.USER_FULLNAME INS_USER, updusr.USER_FULLNAME UPD_USER FROM qr_project pro LEFT JOIN qr_custom cus ON pro.CUS_ID = cus.CUS_ID LEFT JOIN qr_user cmusr ON pro.CM_ID = cmusr.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qr_user pmusr ON pro.PM_ID = pmusr.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qr_dict_buildtype dbt ON pro.BUILD_TYPE = dbt.id LEFT JOIN qr_dict_projecttype ptt ON pro.PROJECT_TYPE = ptt.id LEFT JOIN qr_user updusr ON pro.INS_USER = updusr.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qr_user insusr ON pro.INS_USER = insusr.USER_ID where pro.PRO_STATUS = 0
$condName$ like '%$condValue$%'

SELECT pro.PROJECT_NO, pro.PROJECT_NAME, ord.ORDER_NO, mord.MORDER_ID, mord.MORDER_NO, mord.MORDER_PM, pmuser.USER_FULLNAME MORDER_PM_name, DATE_FORMAT(mord.MAINTAIN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') MAINTAIN_DATE, mord.FAULT_DESC, DATE_FORMAT(mord.APPOINTMENT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') APPOINTMENT_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(mord.PLAN_END_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') PLAN_END_DATE, mord.MWORKER_CNT, DATE_FORMAT(mord.MAINTAIN_BEGIN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') MAINTAIN_BEGIN_DATE, mord.MAINTAIN_STATUS, ms.text maintain_status_desc, mord.MAINTAIN_SPEED, mord.FAULT_TYPE, ft.FAULTTYPE_NAME fault_type_desc, mord.MAINTAIN_PM, pmuser.USER_FULLNAME MAINTAIN_PM_NAME, mord.ACCEPT_STATUS, astust.text ACCEPT_STATUS_DESC, mord.ACCEPTECALL_MAN, mord.CALLBACK_DATE, mord.SOLUTION, mord.MAINTAIN_RESULTDESC, mord.MAINTAIN_REMARK, mord.USER_SCORE, mord.USER_PROPOSAL, DATE_FORMAT(mord.LAST_UPDDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') LAST_UPDDATE, DATE_FORMAT(mord.UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') UPD_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(mord.INS_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') INS_DATE, insusr.USER_FULLNAME INS_USER, updusr.USER_FULLNAME UPD_USER FROM qr_morder mord JOIN qr_order ord ON mord.ORDER_ID = ord.order_id and ord.order_status=0 JOIN qr_project pro ON ord.PROJECT_ID = pro.PROJECT_ID and pro.pro_status=0 LEFT JOIN qr_user pmorderuser ON mord.MAINTAIN_PM = pmorderuser.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qr_dict_maintainstatus ms ON mord.maintain_status = ms.id LEFT JOIN qr_faulttype ft ON FAULT_TYPE = ft.FAULTTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN qr_user pmuser ON mord.MAINTAIN_PM = pmuser.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qr_dict_acceptstatus astust ON mord.ACCEPT_STATUS = astust.id
LEFT JOIN qr_user updusr ON mord.INS_USER = updusr.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qr_user insusr ON mord.INS_USER = insusr.USER_ID where mord.MORDER_STATUS = 0
pro.PROJECT_ID =#projectId#
mord.FAULT_TYPE =#faultType#
mord.MAINTAIN_STATUS =#maintainStatus#

SELECT ord.order_id, ord.ORDER_NO, ord.PROJECT_ID, pro.PROJECT_NAME, pro.PROJECT_NO, ord.WORK_PM_ID, workpm.USER_FULLNAME WORK_PM_Name, ord.WORK_CNT, ord.WORK_ADDRESS, ord.WORK_COMPANY, ord.WORK_COMPANY_QUALIFIED, ord.WORK_TYPE, qdwt.text WORK_TYPE_DESC, ord.WORK_DAYS, ord.PLAN_BEGIN_DATE, ord.PLAN_END_DATE, ord.STORE_PM_ID, storepm.USER_FULLNAME STORE_PM_Name, ord.PLAN_OUTSTORE_DATE, ord.WORK_STATUS, qdws.text WORK_STATUS_DESC, ord.WORK_BEGIN_DATE, ord.WORK_END_DATE, ord.WORK_PROGRESS, ord.LAST_WORKUPD_DATE, ord.CHECKER_ID, checkPm.USER_FULLNAME CHECKER_NAME, ord.CHECK_RESULT, qdwcr.text CHECK_RESULT_DESC, ord.CHECK_DATE, ord.USER_RATING, ord.USER_APPRAISE, ord.WORK_REMARK, DATE_FORMAT(ord.UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') UPD_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(ord.INS_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') INS_DATE, insusr.USER_FULLNAME INS_USER, updusr.USER_FULLNAME UPD_USER FROM qr_order ord JOIN qr_project pro ON ord.PROJECT_ID = pro.PROJECT_ID and pro.pro_status=0 LEFT JOIN qr_user workpm ON ord.WORK_PM_ID = workpm.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qr_dict_worktype qdwt ON ord.WORK_TYPE = qdwt.id LEFT JOIN qr_user storepm ON ord.WORK_PM_ID = storepm.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qr_dict_workstatus qdws ON ord.WORK_STATUS = qdws.id LEFT JOIN qr_user checkPm ON ord.CHECKER_ID = checkPm.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qr_dict_workcheckresult qdwcr ON ord.CHECK_RESULT=qdwcr.id LEFT JOIN qr_user updusr ON ord.INS_USER = updusr.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qr_user insusr ON ord.INS_USER = insusr.USER_ID WHERE ord.order_status = 0
pro.PROJECT_ID =#projectId#
ord.WORK_STATUS=#workStatus#

SELECT * from ( SELECT pro.PROJECT_NO, pro.PROJECT_NAME, di.order_id, ord.ORDER_NO, di.device_type_id, dt.text device_type_name, di.deviceitem_id, di.deviceitem_uid, CONCAT(dt.text, di.deviceitem_id) deviceitem_Name,
if(dt.class_type is null,'',dt.class_type) class_type, if(qddt.text is null,'',qddt.text) class_type_desc, DATE_FORMAT(di.UPD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') UPD_DATE, DATE_FORMAT(di.INS_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') INS_DATE, insusr.USER_FULLNAME INS_USER, updusr.USER_FULLNAME UPD_USER FROM qr_deviceitem di JOIN qr_order ord ON di.order_id = ord.order_id and ord.order_status=0 JOIN qr_project pro ON ord.PROJECT_ID = pro.PROJECT_ID and pro.pro_status=0 LEFT JOIN qr_device_type dt ON di.device_type_id = dt.id LEFT JOIN qr_dict_device_type qddt ON dt.class_type = qddt.id LEFT JOIN qr_user updusr ON pro.INS_USER = updusr.USER_ID LEFT JOIN qr_user insusr ON pro.INS_USER = insusr.USER_ID WHERE di.deviceitem_status = 0
pro.PROJECT_ID =#projectId#
qddt.id=#deviceTypeClassType#
) st where 1=1
st.deviceitem_Name like '%$deviceTypeName$%'
